http://extreme-impact-ammo.com/index.php?l=product_detail&p=103

Our 357 mag. ammo adds more power than ever before to the 357 mag. This ammo is safe to shoot in ANY all steel 357 revolver - this includes J frames. This ammo is no harder on your gun than any other normal 357 ammo. Please don't phone us and ask if this ammo is safe in your gun. It is, providing your gun is in safe condition for use with any normal 357 ammo.

We don't recommend this ammo to be fired in super light alloy revolvers as bullets may jump crimp under recoil, but the ammo itself wont hurt these super light weight revolvers. These revolvers are simply so light that the recoil is severe enough to cause crimp jump.

The below velocities are offered so that you can see what guns/barrel lengths give what velocities with this new 357 mag. ammo. You'll notice that new S&W revolvers with short barrels are often shooting faster than older S&W revolvers with longer barrels. The new S&W revolvers are very good and are made with equipment that makes them more consistent and faster than the S&W revolvers of yesteryear.

title: For Sale:  1 pound bag of Silica Gel Desiccant
location: South Jersey, New Jersey, United States
postcontent:
I have for sale a 1 pound bag of silica gel desiccant.  This stuff is great for putting in a gun safe or in with your ammo to protect your firearms and ammunition from moisture in the air.  A 1 pound bag is larger than you will find almost anywhere else, and will absorb a lot of moisture out of the air.

Silica gel is able to be regenerated once it has absorbed moisture.  Just put it in the oven at 120 degrees for 2 hours, and it'll be ready to use again.

Asking $10+shipping.  I will only ship to the continental 48 states.

The M6A2™ rifle is ideal for those who utilize optical sights as it employs a low- profile gas block. There is no A-frame front sight to obscure the field of view of the optical device. The M6A2™ rifle also features a longer midlength free float rail system with a removable return-to-zero top. Any M4 MIL Std 1913 accessory can be mounted to the rail, and because the rail has a monolithic profile, you can bridge devices from the receiver to the rail seamlessly. The M6A2™ rifle’s edge in capability, reliability, accuracy and long service life is the result of advanced technology materials and manufacturing processes, combined with progressive patented designs. All LWRCI™ carbine systems feature our short-stroke gas-piston operating system. The operating system is lightweight, self-regulating, and self-scraping. This system of operation does not foul the moving parts of the weapon with carbon or heat, greatly enhancing service life and reliability while decreasing both user and armorer maintenance. All M6A2™ rifles feature a match grade, cold rotary hammer forged barrel with a target crown. The barrel is treated with NiCorr™ surface conversion technology that extends service life, enhances accuracy, and increases the effective range of the weapon. As in all of our rifles, the bolt carrier group and the barrel extension of the M6A2™ rifle is coated with EXO’s patented nickel-boron surface conversion technology that provides a hard permanent lubrication to the moving parts.

The M6A2™ rifle defines itself as the most modern and incrementally evolved carbine in the world. At the same time it also presents the best value. title: For Sale:  Gift certificates for long range rifle on our 500 yard range, pistol/CCW and shotgun training on private range
location: Private range 15 min east of Aurora, Denver, Colorado
postcontent:
Gift Certificates available for any class or training in 2014!  All range fees included in class.

Buy the certificate before the end of 2013 and get 10% off

Basic Pistol/ CCW every Sat morning.  About four hours. $100

Includes a short lecture on CCW laws and decision making as well as basic firearm safety and use.
Then we shoot 100 or more rounds.  The key to safety and proficiency is repetition under a knowledgable instructor.  We shoot at steel and clay targets on a dirt embankment for the instant feedback you don't get from shooting at paper targets.

Use your gun or one of my 22s or 9mms at no extra cost.

Level 2 and advanced classes available at our private range which allows

Shooting from the holster
Shooting on the move
Using cover and concealment
Rapid fire
Shooting from different positions.
Long range shooting.  Shoot your pistol several hundred yards to see what you can do.

Private lessons available on your schedule and at your pace.  $200 for the first shooter, $100 for each additional.  This may cover more material than the regular class.  It's up to you.

Long range rifle training on our 500 yard range.  $80 for the first shooter, $60 for ea additional.  About 2 hours.

Includes a short discussion about ballistics, wind estimation and correction and other factors involved in long range shooting.  I'll bring a ballistics chart for your rifle, scope and ammo combination.  We drive to each station at a private range so no waiting for hot/ cold range.

Sight in at 100 to 300 yards or for max point blank zero.
Then step back and shoot steel or clay targets at up to 500 yards.
You paid good money for your hunting, varmint or long range rifle, don't be the weak part of the system.
Long range rifle available if you would like the training before you jump in.

Shotgun training.  $80 for the first shooter, $60 for ea additional including 100 clays.  

Private range so no waiting for stations or being rushed.
Movable traps for virtually any target presentation.
Minimal walking for those that don't get around as well.
Shotguns, including smaller ones for smaller shooters available.

100% 5 star ratings on Google, Yelp, Yahoo etc.

Christian Gesualdo, NRA Certified Instructor
http://www.fixedsighttraining.com/
https://www.facebook.com/fixedsighttraining.
REDACTED

title: For Sale:  Pre-Ban Interdynamic KG-9 Open Bolt 9mm
postcontent:
This Interdynamic KG9 is 31 years old and the condition is outstanding! The KG9 open bolts as with anything pre ban continue to go nothing but up in price. They have been selling for my price and more for years. KG9s have the fixed firing pin on the bolt so no worries about broken firing pins. The manual is very rare and is included here along with 5 mags. Two 36 and three 20 rounders. Oh, BTW this one was sold to me as unfired and remains that way. Matching numbers on the upper and lower. The bolt does appear to be unfired as stated by previous owner. If you see any dark spots on bolt, it's just factory grease still on it.

Ok, the more I see and handle this KG9 the more I want to take it down and keep it.

There were only 3500 of these ever made. Compare that to the 100,000 plus of the MAC open bolts that were produced and you can see how rare these can be at times.

$1500.00

Thanks

MOSSBERG & SONS INC          Special Purpose Semi Automatic    

Mossberg 85370 930SPX Semi-Automatic 12 Gauge 3" 7+1 18.5" Barrel Full Length Sy

All Mossberg 930 Special Purpose shotguns feature a self-regulating gas
system that vents excess gas to aid in recoil reduction and eliminate
stress on critical components. All 930 autoloaders chamber both 2 3/4 inch
and 3-inch 12-gauge shotshells with ease from target loads, to non-toxic
magnum loads, to the latest sabot slug ammo. Magazine capacity is up to 7+1
on models with extended magazine tube, 4+1 on models without. To complete
the package, each Mossberg 930 includes a set of specially designed spacers
for quick adjustment of the horizontal and vertical angle of the stock,
bringing a custom-feel and fit to every shooter. Safety and safe handling
is of paramount importance in special purpose firearms, and the 930 was
engineered with that in mind. The receiver-mounted safety is convenient for
right or left-handed users; simply push the button forward to take the
weapon off safe. A protruding chrome cocking-indicator button is
strategically placed in the front inner-edge of the trigger guard, making
it easy to see and feel when the weapon is cocked or un-cocked. Unloading
has been made easier too, with the Mossberg EZ-Empty system. By depressing
the bolt release, the carrier can be pushed up and the first shotshell in
the magazine removed. Simply repeat until the magazine is empty. All 930
Special Purpose models feature a drilled and tapped receiver, factory-ready
for Picatinny rail, scope base or optics installation. 930 SPX models
conveniently come with a factory-mounted Picatinny rail and LPA/M16-Style
Ghost Ring combination sight right out of the box. Other sighting options
include a basic front bead, or white-dot front sights.

title: For Sale:  Sold Pending Funds. Hi Point .45 excellent gun
location: Santa Fe, NM, New Mexico, United States
postcontent:
Sold pending funds...I am selling here the biggest, clunkiest,  ugliest .45 Auto I have ever owned. It is also one of the most reliable and most accurate ones I ever owned as well. I have put 1000 rounds through it over the last 10 years and have never had a failure to feed, fire,  or eject except for two rounds of cheap Russian Tula that also would not feed through a 1911 I owned.

I bought this gun a bit over 10 years ago frkm Ron Peterson Guns. My wife laughed at me and I laughed at myself for buying it. It feels like a Makita drill when you grip it. It is about as heavy. But guess what? It out shot a Kimber and a Springfield that I had at the time. I sold both of those long agk but the Hi Point stayed. 

I am selling it now because I have somehow accumulated 50 handguns over the years and I am out of room. If I buy another gun safe for handguns my wife won't divorce me but she might make me start sleeping with them instead of her.

Hi Points have a LIFETIME warranty that goes with the gun so you are taking no risk here. If anything ever goes wrong with it (unlikely) just send it to them and they will return it fixed, cleaned, and with an extra magazine. In my opinion they have the best customer service and warranty in the gun business.

Thjs kne is typical with colored three dot adjustable sights. The previous owner made a trigger shoe for it which is wider than the stock trigger. I found it comfortable and just left it on. I installed.the skateboard tale on the grips, and this works to keep it from slipping. It onky ever had one magazine, but I figured 10 rounds of .45 ACP hardball is plenty enough for anything I need.

Below are pictures of the gun and of a target I shot last summer with it at 25 yards. I am not a great pistol shot, but that is 10 rounds in the middle and then I went "around the clock" with the other four to finish up a box of ammo. Thes have fixed barrels and they are all accurate and tough.

My price of $150 is firm and I know I will regret selling this big old ugly great gun.

Contact me through Armslist with your phone number or email, address and we can arrange for you to see it in Santa Fe.

Thanks for reading my long ad. You will like this pistol

Doby Pilgrim
Santa Fe, NM

Lots of nieces and nephews to buy gifts for this Christmas so I'm selling my Zastava AK-47 and everything that goes along with it. Everything listed was purchased new approximately 1 year ago. All items are very slightly used and in excellent condition. I am located in Pittsburgh, PA.

Everything will be sold as a single package for $775. I've included links to most items to show current market value. You're basically getting everything for 65% of current pricing... and probably much further from what I paid during the rush last year.

Century Arms Zastava N-PAP AK-47 Semi Auto Rifle 7.62x39mm 16" Barrel Stamped Receiver 30 Round Magazine Black Polymer Thumbhole Stock (RI2084-N). Great gun, I've fed a few hundred rounds through it without a single jam or problem. You'll see a photo below of a target grouping I had at 100 yards. This was purchased new and built with all new parts. Seen here (http://www.cheaperthandirt.com/product/8-CENT-RI2084N)

Texas Weapon Systems Dog Leg Scope Rail-Gen2 / YUGO Model. I had to wait weeks for this thing. The standard dust cover rails are garbage at keeping scopes true. This thing locks in the same way every time. It is a big reason this gun is at all accurate. The scope is also placed at a proper height to get a good cheek weld on the rifle while shooting. The stock dust cover is also included if you wish to sell this part off after purchase! Seen here (http://texasweaponsystems.com/id1.html)

UTG 3-9x32 CQB Bug Buster Rifle Scope w/ RingsSunshade (SCP-M392AOLWQ). I'm not an optics connoisseur, but eye relief seems great and the solid build quality compares to a much more expensive scope. Seen here (http://www.opticsplanet.com/leapers-utg-3-9x32-compact-cqb-bug-buster-rifle-scope-w-rings-sunshade.html)

UTG Golden Image 38mm Red/Green Dot Sight, Integral Weaver Mount (SCP-RD40RGW). I had this installed before the magnified scope. Same solid build quality as the other scope. Both optics come with original packaging if you'd like to sell one or both off after purchase! Seen here (http://www.amazon.com/dp/B001BQZSZ4/ref=pe_175190_21431760_M3C_ST1_dp_2)

UTG Deluxe Covert Homeland Security Gun Case. This case can hold a load of gear and probably two unscoped rifles if you wanted. Tons of pockets/storage, movable velco straps, and VERY comfortable shoulder straps. The padding is ample and will not dig into your shoulders when weighed down. Seen here (http://www.amazon.com/dp/B001WJ6P4S/ref=pe_175190_21431760_M3C_ST1_dp_1)

Rifle has two steel 30 round magazines that came with it. You will also receive two Tapco 30 round magazines.

740 rounds of 7.62x39 ammunition. All but 40 rounds are the WPA pictured, the rest are Silver Bear. This is the only ammo ever shot in the rifle and is non-corrosive.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Fat Boy Belt
location: Indian Trail between Charlotte & Monroe, Charlotte, North Carolina
postcontent:
This listing has expired. You will no longer be able to contact the seller.
For Sale: Fat Boy Belts

Price:
    $ 75 
Seller:
    Private Party 
Account:
    Registered on 1/1/2013

    Listings by this user

Listed On:
    Thursday, August 29, 2013
Listed In:
    Holsters
Location:
    Charlotte & surrounding, Charlotte, North Carolina - Map 

Flag |
Edit | Favorite

A little bit about Fat Boy Belts

Several years ago I got tired of wearing a belt with a metal buckle that chipped paint on my classic cars, left creases in my expanding beer belly, rusted because us fat boys sweat a little bit more, chipped the finish off of the bedroom floor at night, set off the metal detector at airports, & became entangled in my climbing harness when I was scaling the north slope of Mt. McKinley.

Well I just added that last reason to make you think I was in much better shape than I really am. Makes a great story though. Also I got very annoyed at the belts on the market that were two pieces of thin leather stitched together to make consumers think they were of adequate thickness to be a good belt (hogwash). Because after we pay 25 to 30 bucks for one of these supposedly adequate belts which after being worn for a month or so roll from the strain of us fat boys ever expanding waist lines (& my wife tells me I look like a pot roast with a string tied around it when I take off my shirt on the beach on the Riviera). Well at least I had on bermuda shorts & my ever faithful combat boots on, I wonder what she would say, if I had bought that thong at the duty free shop?

Well none the less, I decided to put my leather expertise to work & design what I believe to be the best belt on the market today. Introducing (drumroll) Fat Boy Belts by Two Fools Leather Goods. These soon to be world famous belts are made from one piece of 10-12, or 14-16 oz. English Harness Leather. This stuff is used for Draft Horse harnesses surely it will hold up to a little strain from my expanding waist line. Over several years of testing & a couple of tweaks to the design on myself & several of my hunting buddies they are the only belt we now wear. Heck, I have even made them for skinny fellers who swear they are the best damn gun belts available. They haven’t chipped paint, left creases, rusted, became entangled in any climbing harness on my recent expeditions, (hey it makes the story flow), or caused any problems at the airport (other than a traffic jam when the nimrod TSA agent makes you remove it & all the other fat boys in line want to know where you found such an innovative, sturdy, & downright smart looking belt).That’s my cue to start handing out cards (which causes even more of a backup).

Try one of my Fat Boy Belts & see for yourself why they are undoubtedly the best belts on the market.

For sale: 07 Yamaha Wolverine 2X4 or 4 X 4 

I can send more pictures via text or email.

Everything is in perfect working condition.
It is maintained by my personal friend/mechanic who is (and has been for over 15 years) a certified mechanic for Honda, Kawasaki, Yamaha, Suzuki, Arctic Cat, Polaris and is currently working with the Can Am team building and testing race motors.... meaning he knows what he is doing.

He is the one that installed everything thing so it's all done correctly.

Here is an article about it if you want to check it out on ATV magazine - http://www.atvriders.com/atvmodels/yamaha2007wolverine4504x4atv.html

If you don't know.  This is the Sport / Utility wheeler - has 2 or 4 wheel push button
automatic - so it's easy to drive

It has a strait back axle so you can tow things without sinking suspension like you would on a 4 wheel independent suspension wheeler.

you get the feeling of a sport wheeler, yet it has 4 wheel drive and rack.
Low-maintenance shaft drives
only 732 miles on it
Warn 2500 lb winch - only used for the plow the one time
Aftermarket front bumper - thicker, stronger - i bought it with this bumper so I don't know much about it
Mount for Moose County Plow.... no plow with it since it's my dads plow.  I used it 1 time to plow then went back to snowblower.. my driveway isn't big enough for a plow
extra set of tires - current ones are good, but I bought an extra pair just in case.

aftermarket rack on back - comes with stock grab bar as well

easily fits in any truck.  I have a tacoma and it fits good.  Not as big as the huge utility wheelers so it will fit into a S-10 or ranger easily

With all the extra I know it is worth way more then $4000 but I am willing to let it go for around

title: For Sale:  Kahr P380 Black Diamond 380ACP pistol - New Condition
postcontent:
For sale is a Kahr P380 Black Diamond model KP3834 which I purchased as a backup and never fired. 

It is marked as a factory test fire (from the Kahr website: Q. What does the "U" on the trigger guard of my pistol mean? A. If there is a "U" engraved on the trigger guard of your pistol, it is a factory refurbished and test fired model (often sold as a "test fired" gun). From what I understand, Kahr pulls some assembled pistols off the assembly line, fires them and marks them as a factory test fire. The advantage is the break in process is already started and you get a new condition pistol at a discounted price. 

It is in the factory box just like you would get a new one. There are no scratches or any marks on the pistol other than the barrel hood which indicates it has been fired at the factory. 


Price: $500 firm.    

No trade offers please. 

I am located in Northwest,IN.  FTF transfer only.   I am able to meet in the Lafayette area as well.

Please be willing to show a LTCH card and a driver’s license.

I am selling my Kel-Tec RFB Hunter version with 24in barrel, Sig Sauer M400 Enhanced 5.56 rifle, and 620 rounds of ammo for the RFB. 

RFB comes with all paperwork, hardcase, magpul flip up sights, 620 rounds of ammo

The RFB is a short-stroke gas piston operated semi-automatic rifle in 7.62 mm NATO caliber. It accepts standard metric FAL type magazines which work "drop free" and do not need to be tilted in. four 20 round magazines are included. Barrels are chrome lined bore and chamber. The muzzle is threaded 5/8x24 TPI and comes equipped with a muzzle brake. All controls are fully ambidextrous; the reciprocating operating handle can be switched to either side. The trigger mechanism is second to no other Bullpup ever built and better than nearly all commercial semi-auto rifles. The safety disconnects the trigger and blocks the hammer action. A Mil-Spec Picatinny rail is attached rigidly to the barrel. No open sights are provided, allowing the user to select from the very best new optics and sight systems available. The RFB comes with a two point sling that can be easily configured to suit the user's preference. 

THE SIGM400 SERIES ENHANCED RIFLE, is designed for use in law enforcement, military operations, the sporting field, as well as competitive shooting. The SIGM400 is a true AR platform tactical rifle with unparalleled accuracy. A 16” chrome-lined and phosphate coated barrel provides superior corrosion resistance, and a 7075-T6 aircraft grade aluminum forged lower receiver adds to the durability and reliability that users come to expect from SIG SAUER. This black version with black polymer Magpul MOE forend and collapsible stock.

title: For Sale:  heckler and koch P2000 V3
location: North County, Vista, San Diego, California
postcontent:
The P2000 is a short recoil-operated locked breech pistol with a modified Browning-type linkless cam action with a vertically tilting barrel also employed in the USP series of self-loading pistols, as well as most modern linkless semi autos.
The cold hammer-forged barrel has a polygonal profile while the slide is made from a solid bar of nitro-carburized steel. Following recent trends in modern pistol design, the P2000 makes extensive use of impact-resistant polymers to reduce weight and production costs.
As with other recent Heckler & Koch pistol designs, the P2000 is modular to suit individual needs. For instance, the grip is modular with exchangeable backstraps, allowing the user to customize the pistol's grip size and feel. There is a universal accessory rail built into the dust cover in front of the trigger guard that allows for the use of tactical lights, laser pointers and other accessories. This is in contrast with the USP series which uses a proprietary H&K mounting rail that limits the types of accessories that could be used with the pistol.
The P2000 is a hammer-fired pistol with an exposed spurred hammer; a bobbed hammer is optional. It has an ambidextrous slide lock and a fully ambidextrous magazine release installed in the trigger guard.V3: SA/DA trigger with a decocking lever mounted at the posterior of the slide to the left of the spurred hammer. Single-action trigger pull of 4.5 lb, double-action trigger pull –11.5 lb. Bought it new last month ran 200 rounds through it basically brand new paid 971.78 with taxes save some money we can do the transfer at Turners in San Marcos or Iron sights in Oceanside call or text REDACTED Thanks Jason.
